reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of CONS 340, GEOB 270. (and fourth year standing in the Global Perspectives Major.)
Co-reqs: FRST 443.
This course is for 4th year Conservation students in the Global Perspectives major. Students must have completed their international experience and GIS requirements, and have been approved by the Program Director. Only qualified candidates may register.
description: Examination of global resources and sustainability via scenario evaluation, modelling, and prescription.
